message.content:
cs.PL, cs.LO, cs.CR, cs.SE, cs.DC 

The paper deals with expressing policy in object-capability-based systems, which is a topic related to programming languages (cs.PL) and logic (cs.LO). The use of the Curry-Howard isomorphism also suggests a connection to type theory and formal methods (cs.CR). The investigation of a behavioral type system for the RHO-calculus suggests a connection to distributed computing (cs.DC) and software engineering (cs.SE).
